record.field: When did you become an OpenERP official partner?
What kind of solutions do you sell to your customers?
What do you think about the partnership contract?
When do you propose a maintenance contract to your customers?
Which maintenance contract do you sell to your customers.
Your own contract, but you buy an OpenERP one
Your own contract without buying an OpenERP one
Give your opinion about Launchpad reporting :
Is Launchpad easy to find in OpenObject website?
Is it easy to report a bug or a blueprint?
Is it easy to add or modify a translation?
Is Launchpad easy to find in OpenObject website?
How are the leads that you find thanks to OpenERP SA be converted in customers?
I didn't try, I don't need new leads
How is OpenERP SA's communication with partners about...
In your opinion, how could OpenERP SA better communicate with partners and on which subjects?
Which activities do you plan to manage with Odoo ?
Why did you subscribe to Odoo?
I was already using OpenERP and wanted to switch to an online offer
It's easier and cheaper than maintaining by myself
I am looking for a SaaS offer for my customers
After having tested it, I plan to download and install it by myself for later use
After having tested it, I don't plan to use it
How much time did you spend to configure the application?
Do you plan to continue using Odoo?
Which interface would you prefer to use?
Are Odoo Website FAQ clear and concise?
Is OpenERP Web Client simple and useful?
Migrating a database to a new version
In your opinion, which modules are missing in Odoo? Give examples :
How often would you prefer to receive your prepaid bill?
Do you plan to use the document management system?
How satisfied are you with Odoo's support services :
The time between your question and our answer is
The pertinence of our answers is
If you have any additional comments, write them here :

field.eval: """I'd like to contribute but I don't know how ?"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """There is too many groups defined, security is too complex to set"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """There is too few groups defined, security isn't accurate enough"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """Yes, I use the 5.0 version, installed locally"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """Yes, I use the latest version on Odoo"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """Descriptions and help tooltips are clear enough"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """Configuration wizard exists for each important setting"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """They are too much menus, it's complex to understand"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """Running the configuration wizards is a good way to spare time"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """I use Launchpad, like all official OpenERP projects"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """The security rules defined on groups are helpfull"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """Those security rules are standard and can be used out-of-the-box in most cases"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """The 'Usability/Extended View' group helps in daily work"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """The 'Usability/Extended View' group hides only optional fields"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """The groups set on menu items are relevant"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """I use the contextual help in OpenERP"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """They help new users to understand OpenERP"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """They are useful on a daily usage"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """A process is defined for all enterprise flows"""
field.name: answer

field.eval: """It's easy to find the process you need"""
field.name: answer
